/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -fPIC -Wall -O3 -DNDEBUG   -shared -Wl,-soname,_common.so -o _common.so CMakeFiles/common.dir/src/caffe/common.cpp.o CMakeFiles/common.dir/src/caffe/common_thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/common.dir/src/caffe/internal_thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/common.dir/_common.cpp.o -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lboost_filesystem -lpthread -lpthread -lglog -lgflags -lhdf5_hl -lhdf5 -lhdf5_hl -lhdf5 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so -llapack -lcblas -latlas -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64:
